nodes.text: Dharus' Buccaneers was a privateer group lead by renowned pirate Dharus. They were affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic and carried out attacks of piracy against the Galactic Empire, along the Leisure Corridor.
The Buccaneers had 97 members and operated three capital ships, the Corellian gunship Dark Revenge and two Corsair-class cruisers, the Red Lancer and the Blue Queen.
